plot: American detective goes to Ireland, for a visit to his late wife's relatives and helps the local police in a case of murder and money forgery.
title: A Likely Story
plot_es: American detective goes to Ireland, for a visit to his late wife's relatives and helps the local police in a case of murder and money forgery.
plot_en: American detective goes to Ireland, for a visit to his late wife's relatives and helps the local police in a case of murder and money forgery.
